name: WooCommerce Ajax Search
author: CODJA

sections.description:
The plugin offers you to add a WooCommerce ajax search functionality for any existing field or create a new field using our shortcode.

On user input, the plugin will start searching for relevant results through your WooCommerce website.

As well as the default settings, the WooCommerce ajax search plugin has many more options that will allow you to customize it in the way you\’d like.

The plugin supports RTL and LTR websites.

Configuration

Use the shortcode [cj_wc_ajax_search] or create a search field, or add “cjAjaxInput” class to an existing input field.
sections.installation:
Important: First of all, you have to download and activate WooCommerce plugin, because without it WooCommerce Ajax Search cannot work.
Unzip the downloaded .zip file in your plugins folder and activate it.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Important: First of all, you have to download and activate WooCommerce plugin, because without it WooCommerce Ajax Search cannot work.
Unzip the downloaded .zip file in your plugins folder and activate it.
